name: SendGrid for WordPress
author: Smackcoders

sections.description:
WP SendGrid plugin enables easy to do one step configuration to switch all your WordPress emails via SendGrid or SMTP. Now you can send WordPress email using SendGrid API using our SendGrid WordPress Plugin

Highlights

  • Sending mail via SendGrid or SMTP
  • Mail Logs can be accessed from WordPress.
  • Can verify campaign status like open, clicked, etc log view.

Other Useful Plugins & Addons By Smackcoders

To Import and Export WordPress Data as CSV or XML
and for premium version of the plugin, you can get it here

The Leads Builder for WordPress to capture your webforms as leads to one of the top-ranking open source CRM, install the WordPress Lead Form Data Collection to CRM Plugin. Install one of the CRM of your choice with the additional add-ons listed below and keep both parent plugin and CRM add-on activated.
* Zoho CRM & Zoho CRM Plus
* Salesforce
* SugarCRM
* Freshsales
* Vtiger CRM

To know more about the premium bundled version, visit WordPress Lead Form Data Collection to CRM with unlimited features
sections.installation:
1. Extract the SendGrid.zip in wordpress/wp-content/plugins using FTP or through plugin install in wp-admin.
  2. Activate the plugin in the WordPress plugin list.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Checked : Compatibility for WordPress 5.8.2
  • Updated : Thirdparty CSS and JS libraries to the latest version

1.3

  • Checked : Compatibility for WordPress 5.7

1.2

  • Added : Compatibility for WordPress 5.6
  • Added : PHP 8 Compatibility

1.1

  • Added : Compatibility for WordPress 5.3
  • Fixed : Show logs issue.
  • Fixed : Send email via default option.
  • Added : Save settings alert.

1.0

  • Initial stable release version.
